name: Time Snap
description:
Time Snap is an insanely fast-paced time bending arcade mobile game. The objective of the game is to avoid the massively incoming bullets. You have the abillity to make the time move or stop. Use it wisely to reach the highest score on the Leaderboard.

You play as an orange circle (that has trail). The circle will move if you tilt your device, but the circle and also the bullets won't move if the time stopped. By tapping and holding your screen, the time will move and by releasing it, the time will stop. Remember, you can't stop the time too long or the game will be over. "Because time won't wait for you".
